newsitem.title: GREECE: Greek socialists give PM green light for election.
newsitem.headline: Greek socialists give PM green light for election.

text.p: The Greek socialist party's executive bureau gave Prime Minister Costas Simitis its backing if he chooses to call snap elections, its general secretary Costas Skandalidis told reporters on Thursday.
Prime Minister Costas Simitis will make an official announcement after a cabinet meeting later on Thursday, said Skandalidis. --Dimitris Kontogiannis, Athens Newsroom +301 3311812-4
